Today I Read... Tech links, comments, updates and more

Today I created my Jekyll based blog for the first time. All the cool kids are doing it.

I’m not sure if this is really much better than Wordpress (although no MySQL + Git sounds pretty sweet)

Julian Assange on Rolling Stone magazine

Julian Assange, founder of Wikileaks, international hacker and possesor of the coolest white hair around, spoke to Rolling Stones magazine. Some of what he says is sensible: “people determined to be in a democracy, to be their own governments, must have the power that knowledge will bring”. Some of it is exactly the kind of thing that a rumoured egomaniac would say: “I don’t think I have a massive ego”. Great interview.

Instagram on WP7 before Android?

Eminently speculative stuff from FastCompany about Instagram Coming to Windows Phone before Android The reasons: WP7 looks better and Microsoft has the cash to incentivize Instagram sufficiently. I’m going to file this under a “maybe”

“Better than the real sport” video of the day

Zorbing is fun. Football is fun. Obviously you have to put them together. Right?
